short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to take snapshots of a JavaScript object and compare them to see which properties have changed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Press Alt + 1 to take snapshot
Press Alt + 2 to clear snapshots
Press Alt + 3 to compare snapshots
NOTE: Make sure to have focus on the webpage and not the console for the shortcuts to work.
